preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 100 g of bismuth using an analytical balance. 
 2. Weigh out 40 g of lithium. 
 3. Weigh out 50 g of lead. 
 4. Weigh out 80 g of samarium. 
 5. Combine all weighed materials in a clean, dry crucible. 
 6. Use a ceramic stirring rod to mix the materials thoroughly until homogenous.
